title: Cosmonomics (Paperback)
description: Cosmonomics unveils the correlation between physical and metaphysical laws in life and how they can be used to aid the physical, spiritual, and economic health of individuals and communities.

description: Cosmonomics unveils the correlation between physical and metaphysical laws in life and how they can be used to aid the physical, spiritual, and economic health of individuals and communities.
